response.answer_text: Well, you can find all sorts of people in any category of peoples. While I haven’t met any yet, I’m sure there’s a few who have an idealised view of themselves. But for the most part, most Japanese are humble and try not to inconvenience others, which is a very important part of their upbringing. And there’s also the saying “The nail that sticks out gets hammered down”, which one could say, encourages people to not be such a narcissist or exhibitionist in general.
